alert.note: Alert for Cochran; Hockley; Lubbock; Terry; Yoakum (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 7:02PM CDT until May 16 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Lubbock County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Cochran County in northwestern Texas... Terry County in northwestern Texas... Southern Hockley County in northwestern Texas... Eastern Yoakum County in northwestern Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 702 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tokio, or 13 miles east of Plains, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Levelland, Brownfield, Sundown, Locketville, Tokio, Meadow, Smyer, Ropesville, Wellman and Opdyke West. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
